explains: n. 宗谱；血统；家系；系谱学

sentences.en: And yet even I don't care about my genealogy.
sentences.cn: 但就算如此，我也不会在乎我的家谱。

sentences.en: You may wonder why I should write a genealogy.
sentences.cn: 你或许会好奇，我为什么会为自己建立族谱？

sentences.en: But genealogy fascinates everyone who is not in my family.
sentences.cn: 但是除了我们家人以外，其他人都对家谱十分着迷。
